content.raw:
Oh, thanks, I didn’t see that. I have opened the file and I see that some entries are correctly marked as decoy in the DataFrame:

‌

```python
>>> df = mzid.DataFrame('Downloads/01650b_BA5-TUM_first_pool_75_01_01-3xHCD-1h-R2-features-index-percolator-fdr-filter.mzid')
>>> df.isDecoy.sum()
2034
```

So there are 2034 rows for decoy PSMs. I have checked with the latest release and development versions. Can you try this on your system?
